website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Hybrid Rocket Runner was a surprise for many because they didn’t expect functionality to reign supreme in a fashionable silhouette.  But this road companion offered precisely that, and runners welcomed it with open arms. The durable build and the useful materials were also highlighted. And though the traction wasn’t apparently top-notch on slick surfaces, it didn’t deter the shoe enthusiasts.
pros: The traction capacity of the outsole unit was appreciated by the testers
The underfoot cushioning system of the Puma Hybrid Rocket Runner was considered to be responsive
People generally liked the aesthetics of this running shoe
The width profiles were welcomed as they apparently adhered to expectations
Consumers lauded the overall durability of this product’s materials, stating that the components lasted long
cons: Traction wasn’t very reliable on slippery or dusty surfaces, according to a tester

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe for casual. Not a good high action sport shoe.
customer_reviews.text: We are keeping as a casual shoe because it fits very nicely, is well cushioned, a very flexible. Therein lies the problem, (flexible) . Purchased to play pickleball which needs a low grip bottom that this one has. (Less likely to tear up your knees with quick lateral moves.) I advanced and one shoe stayed on the court during two different plays. I could not tighten them anymore to allow them to stay on my feet. They allowed a little to much ankle movement. Saying all that, they are so VERY comfortable and look sharp for casual ware. They are a keeper for me but for reasons not intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great for large people!
customer_reviews.text: Toe box expands well within the mesh. Width can be adjusted perfectly by the design of the lacing. There is a slight rub point distal pinky toe side but, I’ve never noticed it during running and no marks or blisters after 5-8 mile runs. I love the supportive cushion this provides. My feet feel great regardless of the distance. I’m 240 6’2 Half marathon training.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Hybrid rocket runner can’t be beat . The most comfortable shoe I have worn. And I am a sneakerhead
customer_reviews.author: PUMA GO TIME

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the cat's meow. Superb arch support and the best heel cushion. Are a little tight but the mesh upper is very forgiving for my wide feet. The heel to toe fit was perfect, just enough room up front for my toes to feel comfortable. I'm 67 and still put in 10,000 steps a day working, so these kicks are a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Wm David

customer_reviews.title: Great for heel spurs and shin splints.
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe ever for my running. Ive put over 300 miles in the last 3 months and the tread is still pretty good. I plan on buying some new ones though. I've purchased th8s shoe 5x. Ive bought, Brooks, Mizuno, Nike, and other running shoes and these by far reduce heel spurs and shin split pain. I'm very closevto running 200 miles for October 2020 for the first time in my life. Ive never been able to put in this type of mileage. My legs would just feel, so beat down. The large foam bottom has trully change my life.
customer_reviews.author: P Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Very cushiony
customer_reviews.text: FOR RUNNING REVIEW: Great cushion to absorb shock. Unless you tie them tightly your foot slides slightly causing warmth on the bottom of foot. The mesh is for forgiving and helps your foot breath. The lacing system is intriguing and hugs the midfoot area real well. When you tie them though, there is no area to snug the lacing around or through like conventional shoe lacing systems which leaves the laces long. I tied them very tight (preference) and they worked satisfactorily. Overall they are great for recreational running, not a LONG RACE....
customer_reviews.author: Keiara M.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: this is a very comfortable pair of shoes. It is not as comfortable as the Addias utraboost, but a close second.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple days to break in but other than that, no complaints. Made my runs better!
customer_reviews.author: StickySmegma

customer_reviews.title: Shoe will grow on you
customer_reviews.text: When i first got this show it fit a bit snug, but now it feels like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best New Puma shoe Available
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments. Look worse online than in person. Extremely comfortable and great look.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable black shoe. Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! It is comfortable and stylish. Im buying a second pair for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Shekera

customer_reviews.title: The cushioning is VERY comfterable
customer_reviews.text: The upper of the shoe was slightly tighter thqlan expected but it was very comfterable especially the nrgy and ignite foam technology but the shoe lacing was very odd and different
customer_reviews.author: Geancarlo

customer_reviews.title: A full Size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but get a FULL size larger. Even more if you prefer a loose fit.
customer_reviews.author: J Fusco

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe that looks great
customer_reviews.text: After running and working out in these shoes for a few weeks, I am very happy with them. They feel great. Super comfortable, with a quality build. And they look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Puma is my new brand of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Geez, where do I begin? These are my 3rd pair of Puma sneakers and this pair feel like my feet are gliding on a cloud
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Quality in a running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. Puma got it right on this one. This is my 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Al Mack

customer_reviews.title: It's a must buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes it fits perfectly an is super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: tosh Sargeant

customer_reviews.title: The quality is and style is 👌👌
customer_reviews.text: My son feel in love with the shoes ,nothing bad to said 👌👌👌👌👌👌🤗🎉
customer_reviews.author: Besy rivera

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: Received it real, got best price and it runs perfectly fine
customer_reviews.author: Zameer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sneaker Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes from the Puma website however, I'm to order 2 more pairs different colors. These shoes are hands down the most comfortable tennis shoes I've ever purchased. I'm a Puma head 😊 and have about 20pairs most are their classics I wear for fashion. These Hybrid Rockers are the only shoes that keep comfort when I'm riding my bicycle or standing and walking for long periods of time. Feel like I'm walking on air. I've injured my left leg a few times and these shoes give me the much needed shock resistance.
customer_reviews.author: TJG

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Hybrid Rocket Runner Sneaker
product_meta.description: The all new hybrid rocket runner is a game changer for everyday cushioned running shoes.. the hybrid foam is a mix of our two most innovative midsole foam ignite and nrgy. The nrgy beads provide instant cushion and comfort while the ignite foam provides fantastic energy return to propel you faster. The shoe is lightweight and fuses street style with technology
